description:
Glenn gets the auspicious number of being the 1000th video. I know, you'd think I would try to get ten guys in, but most of the guys won't do a gang bang scene without expecting the same pay, and heck, flying int that many dudes is way beyond my budget. Actually I am not a fan of more than 3-4 guys in a scene. Too much going on, it's visually distracting. Now, a bukkake, that has a certain appeal, but I still couldn't find a way to do something spectacular. Guys don't want to fly across the country for a 100 or $200 bucks and miss 2 days of their lives.
Having said all that, you SHOULD watch this Serviced video. Ransom really is on his game and I love how Glenn gets much more responsive after getting his ass rimmed.
He may not bottom his first time out, but you can tell he is not afraid of some anal attention!
Ransom jerks him till he cums and gets a little cum licking in at the end.
An awesome Serviced video that will leave you wanting more of Glenn!
title: Glenn & Ransom - Serviced
